summary: During the 1800s, a safari guide, two elephant hunters and their crew run into trouble with the natives in the South African veld when they refuse to offer gifts to the tribesmen.
cast: Cornel Wilde|Gert van den Bergh|Ken Gampu|Patrick Mynhardt|Bella Randles|Morrison Gampu|Sandy Nkomo|Eric Mcanyana|John Marcus|Richard Mashiya|Franklyn Mdhluli|Fusi Zazayokwe|Joe Dlamini|Jose Sithole|Horace Gilman
title: La presa desnuda
